Details

This protocol is defined within the didcomm-messaging spec, currently located here: https://identity.foundation/didcomm-messaging/spec/#trust-ping-protocol-20

frontmatter.title: Trust Ping
frontmatter.summary: The trust-ping protocol defined in the DIDComm Messaging Spec. This enables the sender and recipient to engage in an exchange of trust pings.
